p: Tooth decay is one of the most important challenges for public health in different countries. Herbal compounds may have antibacterial properties and inhibitory effects on bacterial biofilm formation, and because of their low price, high availability, less side effects, they are candidate for being used as complementary agents along with common antibiotics and chemical materials (Giorgio et al., 1997 ▶) (Nurizadeh et al., 2004 ▶).
